plot: As a parting shot, fired reporter Ann Mitchell prints a fake letter from unemployed &"John Doe,&" who threatens suicide in protest of social ills. The paper is forced to rehire Ann and hires John Willoughby to impersonate &"Doe.&" Ann and her bosses cynically milk the story for all it's worth, until the made-up &"John Doe&" philosophy starts a whole political movement. At last everyone, even Ann, takes her creation seriously...but publisher D.B. Norton has a secret plan.   Written by  Rod Crawford
title: Juan Nadie
